    Why the animal theme?

    I chose animal themes ‚Äî particularly oceanic ones like the cuttlefish ‚Äî because they reflect the nature of cybersecurity work: adaptive, intelligent, and often operating in the unseen depths. The ocean is vast and complex, just like the cloud. Plus, let‚Äôs be honest ‚Äî security blogs are more fun with tentacles.
